entity.name: Days of our Lives
entity.description: Set in the fictional Midwestern town of Salem, this long-running saga follows the lives, loves, triumphs and tragedies of the Horton, Brady, Kiriakis, Hernandez and DiMera families. Love stories, family troubles and suspenseful adventures embroil the denizens of Salem in every form of drama from flowering courtships, love triangles and unexpected wedding day reveals to custody battles, switched identities, murder investigations, lingering comas, mental illness, kidnappings, amnesia cases and more.

text: @antwilding23 @mandysmusings62 @EnvAgencyNW @VolkerStevinUK The wall itself has been completed and now offers protection to homes and businesses, which we thought was worth celebrating, but yes there are some additional works as part of the overall scheme. Thanks.
@MerseyRivers @salford_mayor @SalfordUni @SalfordVRangers @natural_course @EnvAgencyNW @MarkSewellUU @GroundworkGM Hi, do you have anyone available I could speak to about this?

Presumably there will now be the replanting of the thousands of trees that were ripped out to do it and hopefully any re-laying of tarmac will NOT be done with that lethal stuff used on and around the Bay Gateway
